column1: I'm always grateful for your support especially during the holiday season. We put together this fun video holiday card to express our thanks and help us all get in the holiday spirit. Enjoy the cafecito for all! https://t.co/yAV2KqfkS9
It was a joy eating lunch with my friend @CommishEileen and a few of our constituents today! https://t.co/8EBpUf2csz

This past weekend the @MiamiDadeDems hosted the largest #BlueGala in recent memory. Miami-Dade Dems must have the resources to make sure that we can turn Miami-Dade and Florida blue in 2020.  I'm thrilled to have joined my friends and neighbors for such a fantastic event! https://t.co/2jw01qRIs8
It is always nice to spend time catching up with our friends and neighbors in Coral Gables. https://t.co/O30Pdymyhp

North Bay Village is one of the many communities I have the privilege of representing in Congress. It is a joy to meet with its residents to talk about the work we're doing on their behalf in Congress. https://t.co/x7lE73sDBq
#HappeningNow Honored to spend some time with the @FlaDems Women’s Club. Together we will take back our state and our country. https://t.co/dc8LJObSyF

Excited to have shared the stage tonight with my colleagues @DarrenSoto and @SMurphyCongress. Florida Democrats are fired up and ready to go. Thank you @FlaDems the Florida Blue Convention has been a great success!   2020 is the year we turn Florida blue! https://t.co/J7cpAFFGBM

The funny part is Matt and I have worked well together in Congress. We've filed multiple bills together! I expected more from him but I guess he takes his cues on human decency from Trump too. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

It's been a year since #HurricaneMichael and people in FL are still struggling to recover.  Instead of serving his community @mattgaetz is busy defending Trump's high crimes and misdemeanors by protesting in front of my office. 1/2 https://t.co/OvcY9A9756

.@MomsDemand Action are fighting to promote measures to protect people in their communities from gun violence.  I promise to be your champion. We must #EndGunViolence in America. https://t.co/ig45o23hUM

Democrats are committed to supporting the Venezuelan people in their struggle to return democracy to their country.  Thank you to @SpeakerPelosi and  @carlosvecchio & my colleagues in Congress for their tireless efforts on behalf on the Venezuelan people in the US & abroad. https://t.co/tcDfcJlS1v

As a founding member of @emilyslist I understand the importance of recruiting  Democratic women to run for office & having them win.  If you're a woman thinking of running I encourage you to register for Emily's List's Run to Win 101 training.  https://t.co/LzAfsH0M52
My friend @jguerrajr is one heck of a guy. Thank you to you and @MiamiRealtors for your continued support! https://t.co/YTDG7EqiYB
Great morning in #KeyBiscayne with friends talking about the issues that matter to #FL27 https://t.co/tB7I6RuxuS
#Dorian is now forecast to be a Category 4 hurricane when it makes landfall.  If you haven't already now is the time to buy supplies and make a plan. https://t.co/g0bMnkr1tP

Tropical Storm Dorian has gained strength and is now a hurricane.   It is the time to start thinking about the kind of preparations you may need to take in the event of a storm. https://t.co/DT4dmXcZCI

Thank you to @riseupflorida for inviting me to participate in their celebration of #WomensEqualityDay.  It is always a pleasure to speak to constituents about the work we're doing in Congress. https://t.co/XrdTev8Ohe

Proud to stand with my 20000 @CWAUnion  brothers and sisters across the Southeast who are on strike over unfair labor practices.  Never forget: there is power in a union.  #honkifyousupportworkers https://t.co/spIn6IFEEG
Best of luck tonight to @Coach_MannyDiaz and the entire @CanesFootball team.  Let's go Canes! 🙌

It is always great meeting with @AFSCMEFL.   As a proud union member I know that unions are the backbone of America's labor movement and reason behind so many of the workplace protections Americans enjoy today. https://t.co/Yt70JdOFAI
It was great to partner with @LubbyNavarro @MiamiSup from @MDCPS & @KarlaMats from @UTD_AFT1974 to distribute book bags as we get ready for #backtoschool https://t.co/4Aa6awG1HA
My longtime friend Toni Morrison was a magnificent storyteller and an outstanding person.  May her soul rest in peace.

Public service is a privilege. I'm lucky to have spent my life working to build better communities and a better country. Thank you to the South Dade Democrats for putting together a fantastic town hall meeting. https://t.co/G3uFjc92YC
Via @MiamiHerald : Republicans play defense on Venezuela after rejecting TPS  https://t.co/bv4u4GKRHE

My beloved rescue dog Sweetie went to heaven today. She was 16 and a half years old. She was born on the streets of Miami beaten up & thrown in a dumpster. She was rescued and adopted by me at 11 months. A mutt she was bilingual & an advocate for the  Pets Trust. Rest in peace. https://t.co/0gNV5A8XNQ

Great speaking to @jimdefede yesterday about the work I'm doing on behalf of our community in Washington. Tune in tomorrow to Facing South Florida on @CBSMiami at 1130 am to learn more. https://t.co/nnmwAL7Jtq
With each passing day that President Trump fails to grant TPS to Venezuelans the  hypocrisy becomes clearer. Enough talk - denying TPS to Venezuelans is cruel and inhumane. It is past time to act.

La doble moral del presidente Trump queda en evidencia cada día que pasa y no otorga el TPS a los venezolanos en EE.UU. Basta de hablar es momento de actuar. Negar el TPS a los venezolanos es cruel e inhumano. El momento es ahora. https://t.co/ZsxtgYgFdS
I look forward to continue working with SAVE to build a more equitable and accepting society for LGBTQ peoples here in Miami-Dade county. 2/2

Congratulations to Damian Pardo for being named Interim Exectuive Director of SAVE! Damian is the founding chair of SAVE and a long-time advocate and leader in the fight for LGBTQ rights. 1/2 https://t.co/5NkfHqETNx
Congratulations! Great win for the red white and blue. https://t.co/IkhT1QIELW
I believe that we will win! I believe that we win! I believe that we will win! #USWNT
Eager to hear from the all the candidates on stage for the the second night of #DemDebate2020 https://t.co/kO7GViTajW
The trust and support of the Latino community in South Florida must be earned Mr. Trump. You have a long way to go. 3/3

How can you say you stand with our communities when you refuse to grant or extend TPS for Venezuelans Nicaraguans or Hondurans?  How can Latinos support you while your administration continues to house children in cages? 2/3

Funny how @RealDonaldTrump postponed raids in Miami that would have torn apart immigrant families the weekend before he launched his reelection campaign’s Latino outreach efforts. We aren’t fooled Mr. Trump 1/3 https://t.co/MWntYGC1qv
#happeningnow Standing up with @FlaDems at #LeadershipBlue to discuss the importance of protecting coverage for preexisting conditions and the #ACA https://t.co/nzXlxuOo7w
Congratulations to Alina Tejeda Hudak. #Thankyou for all the years of service to our community with @MiamiDadeCounty Enjoy your next adventure. https://t.co/SQphCyOBxP
Congratulations to @KarlaMats  Tony Mindy and all the @UTD_AFT1974 board members on being sworn in tonight. @AFTunion @NEAToday @FloridaEA https://t.co/SYUmDMcNYo
This must be investigated. A no-bid contract to continue the detention of children at tax payer’s expense is wrong. https://t.co/OUhUI2mRhT
Catching @CanesBaseball with my friend the #miamimaniac https://t.co/2cWr2G8weL
Congratulations to my good friend Raúl Valdés-Fauli @RVF4Mayor on your re-election. I look forward to working together for the people of @CityCoralGables and #FL27. https://t.co/VHpkeVSYiO
Today is voting day in @CityCoralGables! Get out the vote - polls are open until 7pm. #ElectionDay https://t.co/EF6iG2bw4N
As I told @thelilynews: Age is just a number. https://t.co/Roz7hG45hG

I'm proud to call Miami home a community that is diverse and welcoming to all immigrants. But I'm not proud of SB168 an anti-immigrant bill that threatens our communities and erodes trust between local law enforcement. #WeAreFL #StopSB168
Sweetie is in her teens but she’s still a puppy to me. Happy #NationalPuppyDay! https://t.co/DPolOSWHxM
This news is disappointing but congratulations to @MayorOfMKE and the City of Milwaukee for being picked to host the 2020 Democratic National Convention. https://t.co/aYq8tCqcs8
Excited that my friend @david4florida will be running for #MiamiBeach City Commissioner. I look forward to working with him to serve our community! https://t.co/JOcqUTIuOC

The House took meaningful steps this week in addressing gun violence by passing two bills that expands background checks closes the gun show loop hole and extends the FBI waiting period from 3 days to 10. I made a promise on the campaign and will continue to work hard for #FL27 https://t.co/LaSveq2vr3

The #FakeEmergency is a real constitutional crisis. The people's House has taken action to stop the President's dangerous power grab. It's time for the Senate to follow suit and do what's right for our Constitution. https://t.co/WSVaChJXkZ
Separating families and keeping children like prisoners is wrong and this must stop: https://t.co/izRvmyAtgz @fabiolasantiago

Exigimos al régimen de Nicolás Maduro dejar entrar la ayuda humanitaria que el pueblo de Venezuela tanto necesita. Mi corazón con Venezuela en este día histórico.   #23FAvalanchaHumanitaria https://t.co/0hs96XHB3x

Delivered a brief update tonight @DowntownDems meeting and shared more about how we are fulfilling the promise to combat climate change prevent gun violence and extend TPS for immigrant communities in #FL27.   Thank you for having us over! https://t.co/vlwOHkisDk

Difiero de @BernieSanders en esta lamentable declaración Maduro es un dictador y debe irse lo antes posible. @jguaido es el presidente interino y tiene todo mi apoyo. Solo deseo libertad para los venezolanos y trabajo día a día para ayudar a conseguirla. https://t.co/izQnZBcDyb

The President has no business in South Florida if he does not plan to extend TPS for Venezuelans. In 2018 nearly 22000 Venezuelans filed for asylum in the United States. Maduro has oppressed his people and cut off basic needs to live. #VenezuelaLibre

El presidente no tiene nada que hacer en el sur de la Florida si no planea extender un TPS para los venezolanos. Aproximadamente 22000 venezolanos solicitaron asilo en los EE.UU en el 2018. Maduro oprime a su gente y eliminó su acceso a las necesidades básicas para vivir.
